select
from pt_duty as duty left join pt_organ as organ on duty.organ_uuid=organ.organ_uuid left join pt_role as role on duty.role_uuid=role.role_id where duty.dutyid = #{dutyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from pt_duty as duty left join pt_organ as organ on duty.organ_uuid=organ.organ_uuid left join pt_role as role on duty.role_uuid=role.role_id
